answers.answer: hi atayah,the symptoms you are facing are quite vague.Hence, a proper evaluation  is needed for which you should consult an Neurologist.It can be anything like anxiety,neuropathy,Transient Ischemic Attack etc to name a few.How old are you?.Any history of anxiety,diabetes or hypertension?

question: I have tinglingon right side. My body feels like it's burning and then it gets ice cold. I have flu like symptoms just about every day. The right side of my head feels like it's burning. I get dizzy and lightheaded but not all the time. What is causing this? Could it be neurothapy?
title: neuropathy
